name: Dr Roger's Rocket Shoes
description:
Can you find all of the parts of the rocket shoes needed to escape?

This is a collaboration between myself and KookieBeatz' in the Ludum Dare 42 game jam. It was my second ever game jam, and KookieBeatz first. Like any good jammers we are open to feedback: let us know what you think of the game, and let me know if you find any terrible bugs (I am aware of a few, but I don’t think there are any that will break the game!)

All controls are in game

[A] [D] Move
[Arrow keys] Shoot (works in all four directions)
[W] [Space] Jump
[S] Hold to activate shield (Powerup required)
[Q] [E] Throw bomb (Powerup required)
